formula: a(n+1) = (8*n+1)(!^8).a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} (-8)^(n-k)*A048994(n, k); A048994 = Stirling-1 numbers.E.g.f. (1-8*x)^(-1/8).G.f.: 1+x/(1-9x/(1-8x/(1-17x/(1-16x/(1-25x/(1-24x/(1-33x/(1-32x/(1-... (continued fraction). - _Philippe Deléham_, Jan 07 2012a(n)=(-7)^n*sum_{k=0..n} (8/7)^k*s(n+1,n+1-k), where s(n,k) are the Stirling numbers of the first kind, A048994. [_Mircea Merca_, May 03 2012]G.f.: 1/Q(0) where Q(k) = 1 - x*(8*k+1)/(1 - x*(8*k+8)/Q(k+1) ); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Mar 20 2013G.f.: 2/G(0), where G(k)= 1 + 1/(1 - 2*x*(8*k+1)/(2*x*(8*k+1) - 1 + 16*x*(k+1)/G(k+1))); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, May 30 2013G.f.: G(0)/2, where G(k)= 1 + 1/(1 - x*(8*k+1)/(x*(8*k+1) + 1/G(k+1))); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jun 05 2013
mathematica: s=1;lst={s};Do[s+=n*s;AppendTo[lst, s], {n, 8, 5!, 8}];lst (*_Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Nov 08 2008 *)
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
extensions: Additional comments from _Philippe Deléham_ and _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 29 2005
Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 14 2008 at the suggestion of Artur Jasinski.
